content.content: This is a final notice of upcoming collateral offboardings as per MIP62. The offboardings will occur in the next Executive Vote, currently scheduled to go live on 2023-03-08. USDC-A, GUSD-A, and USDP (PAXUSD-A) vaults will be offboarded, and the remaining positions liquidated. This will be achieved by setting the liquidation ratio on these vault types to 1500%. Please take action now if you wish to prevent your position from being liquidated. Further information can be seen in the forum thread here: [USDC-A, USDP-A, GUSD-A] Proposed Offboarding Parameters Poll approving this action: Maker Governance - Offboarding Parameters for USDC-A, USDP-A, and GUSD-A - January 23, 2023
